how to:
    https://www.javadevjournal.com/spring-boot/spring-boot-application-as-a-service/

sources for winsw
    https://github.com/kohsuke/winsw

download .exe winsw
    https://github.com/kohsuke/winsw/releases

config:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<service>
   <id>Aiai-service</id>
   <name>aiai</name>
   <description>Aiai Spring Boot as a service.</description>
   <executable>java</executable>
   <arguments>-Dhttps.protocols=TLSv1.2,SSLv3 -Xrs -Xms512m -Xmx512m -jar "%BASE%\git\apps\aiai\target\aiai.jar" --httpPort=8080</arguments>
   <logmode>rotate</logmode>
</service>
